sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access/>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.FNTransformChooserUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Provides support for the fn_transform_chooser UI page.</description>
        <name>FNTransformChooserUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[// field normalization

var FNTransformChooserUtil = Class.create();

FNTransformChooserUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function(jelly) {
        this.jelly = jelly;
        this.sys_id = this.jelly.sysparm_collectionID;
    },
    
    init: function() {
        // get the table and field from our transform...
        var gr = new GlideRecord('fn_transform_config');
        if (!gr.get(this.sys_id))
            return false;
        
        this.table = '' + gr.table;
        this.field = '' + gr.field;
        
        // figure out what the field type is...
        var hierarchy = GlideDBObjectManager.getTables(this.table);
        gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
        gr.addQuery('name', hierarchy);
        gr.addQuery('element', this.field);
        gr.query();
        if (!gr.next())
            return false;
        
        this.type = '' + gr.internal_type;
        
        // now get our categories
        gr = new GlideRecord('fn_transform_category_type');
        gr.addQuery('type.type', this.type);
        gr.query();
        var ids = [];
        while (gr.next())
            ids.push('' + gr.category);
        gr = new GlideRecord('fn_transform_category');
        gr.addQuery('sys_id', ids);
        gr.orderBy('order');
        gr.query();
        this.categories = gr;
        return true;
    },
    
    nextCategory: function() {
        var result = (!!this.categories) ? this.categories.next() : false;
        if (!result)
            return false;
        
        // initialize our transform definitions...
        var gr = new GlideRecord('fn_transform_def_category');
        gr.addQuery('category', '' + this.categories.getUniqueValue());
        gr.query();
        var ids = [];
        while (gr.next())
            ids.push('' + gr.def);
        gr = new GlideRecord('fn_transform_def');
        gr.addQuery('sys_id', ids);
        gr.orderBy('name');
        gr.query();
        this.defs = gr;
        return result;
    },
    
    // returns the URI to create the current transform
    getURI: function() {
        var uri = [];
        uri.push('fn_transform.do?sys_id=-1');
        uri.push('sys_is_list=true');
        uri.push('sys_is_related_list=true');
        uri.push('sys_target=fn_transform');
        uri.push('sysparm_checked_items=');
        uri.push('sysparm_collection=fn_transform_config');
        uri.push('sysparm_collectionID=' + this.jelly.sysparm_collectionID);
        uri.push('sysparm_collection_key=config');
        uri.push('sysparm_collection_label=' + this.jelly.sysparm_collection_label);
        uri.push('sysparm_collection_related_field=');
        uri.push('sysparm_collection_related_file=');
        uri.push('sysparm_collection_relationship=');
        uri.push('sysparm_fixed_query=');
        uri.push('sysparm_list_css=');
        uri.push('sysparm_query=def%3d' + this.getDefSysID());
        uri.push('sysparm_referring_url=fn_transform_config.do%3fsys_id%3d' + this.jelly.sysparm_collectionID);
        uri.push('sysparm_target=');
        uri.push('sysparm_view=');
        return uri.join('&');
    },
    
    nextDef: function() {
        return (!!this.defs) ? this.defs.next() : false;
    },
    
    getCategoryName: function() {
        return '' + this.categories.name;
    },
    
    getCategoryDescription: function() {
        return '' + this.categories.description;
    },
    
    getDefName: function() {
        return '' + this.defs.name;
    },
    
    getDefDescription: function() {
        return '' + this.defs.description;
    },
    
    getDefSysID: function() {
        return '' + this.defs.sys_id;
    },

    type: 'FNTransformChooserUtil'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>tom.dilatush</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2011-01-07 10:34:35</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>5ff20fd70ab30154197817405b01e0ff</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>FNTransformChooserUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Field Normalization" source="com.snc.field_normalization">74d312912f730110d8a4d5f62799b6a5</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5ff20fd70ab30154197817405b01e0ff</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>tom.dilatush</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2011-01-16 16:57:38</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>3804</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
